translationText: And who forgives sins except Allah?
Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness.

arabicText: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا
translationText: Say, 'O My servants who have transgressed against themselves, do not despair of Allah’s mercy. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins.'

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يَقْبَلُ ٱلتَّوْبَةَ عَنْ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَعْفُوا۟ عَنِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ
translationText: And He is the one who accepts repentance from His servants and pardons misdeeds.

arabicText: وَٱسْتَغْفِرِ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
translationText: And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

arabicText: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ سَرِيعُ ٱلْعِقَابِ ۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَغَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
translationText: Indeed, your Lord is swift in penalty; but indeed, He is Forgiving and Merciful.

arabicText: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ سُوءًا أَوْ يَظْلِمْ نَفْسَهُۥ ثُمَّ يَسْتَغْفِرِ ٱللَّهَ يَجِدِ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًا
translationText: Whoever does evil or wrongs himself then seeks forgiveness of Allah will find Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
Indeed, Allah loves those who repent.
Your Lord is the Forgiving, the Possessor of Mercy.

arabicText: فَإِن تَابُوا۟ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخْوَٰنُكُمْ فِى ٱلدِّينِ
translationText: But if they repent, establish prayer, and give zakah, then they are your brothers in religion.

arabicText: وَإِن تُبْدُوا۟ مَا فِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَوْ تُخْفُوهُ يُحَاسِبْكُم بِهِ ٱللَّهُ ۖ فَيَغْفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ
translationText: Whether you reveal what is within yourselves or conceal it, Allah will bring you to account for it. Then He will forgive whom He wills and punish whom He wills.
